mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Episode (novelNum, episodeTitle, episodeSummary) VALUES (#{novelNum}, #{episodeTitle}, #{episodeSummary});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Episode WHERE episodeTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%');
mapper.update: UPDATE Episode SET novelNum = #{novelNum}, episodeTitle = #{episodeTitle}, episodeSummary = #{episodeSummary} WHERE episodeNum = #{episodeNum};
